data.title: Energy partnership between Thailand, Cambodia back on the table - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Phnom Penh is optimistic that talks with Paetongtarn Shinawatra’s government and historic ties with Thaksin will result in a deal beneficial to both sides.

data.title: Cambodian maid is arrested and deported by Malaysia for criticizing Cambodia leaders on social media - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: A Cambodian woman who worked as a maid in Malaysia has been deported to her homeland for comments she posted on social media.

data.title: UN chief implicitly criticizes Cambodia’s upcoming elections after top opposition party ban - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: U.N. Secretary-General Antonio Guterres implicitly criticized Cambodia’s upcoming elections Wednesday for failing to be inclusive, after the top opposition party was not allowed to register.

data.title: ​Musica Felice returns: Charity concert to empower Cambodia’s youth​
data.description: ​​Musica Felice returns: Charity concert to empower Cambodia’s youth​

data.title: Foreign Ministry says Anwar unaware of Cambodian opposition figure's entry - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: The Foreign Ministry confirmed that ex-Cambodian opposition leader Sam Rainsy has left Malaysia Wednesday morning.

data.title: Cambodia’s leader says arrested protesters were trying to overthrow the government - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Cambodia’s leader on Thursday condemned international human rights groups for criticizing the arrest of nearly 100 people for protesting against a decades-old regional development agreement with neighboring countries.

data.title: Cambodia preparing strategy to graduate from LDC status by 2029: PM - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Cambodia has received the UN Committee for Development Policy's evaluation to pass the three-year review so that it can exit the LDC status.

data.title: Asics Said It Helped Remedy Labor Abuse in Cambodia. Activists Disagree. - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Labor advocates have poked holes at Asics’s claims that a prosecuted and jailed union leader at one of its Cambodian suppliers was reinstated to his former position following the overturning of his conviction.

data.title: Malaysia, Cambodia launch QR linkage for instant cross-border payments - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Central banks of Malaysia and Cambodia on Thursday launched the QR payment linkage that would allow consumers and merchants in both countries to make and receive instant payments. RELATED Under the first of the two-phase rollout, Cambodians can make instant retail payments in Malaysia by scanning DuitNow QR codes displayed by merchants using their mobile […]

data.title: Cambodian environment minister bans logging at tycoon’s Cardamoms hydropower project - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: The Stung Meteuk hydropower project is being developed by a company under Ly Yong Phat, a ruling party senator notorious for a long history of environmentally and socially destructive businesses.

data.title: Big brands urge Cambodian govt to drop independent union probe - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Adidas and Puma among big brands cautioning Phnom Penh over free speech.

data.title: ​UN-sanctioned special days of observation each year – more than just dates on a calendar​
data.description: ​​UN-sanctioned special days of observation each year – more than just dates on a calendar​

data.title: Cambodia Is Moving The Right Way: Three Takeaways - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: A visit to Cambodia can give you the sense of existing in several centuries at once.

data.title: NagaCorp flags $411M GGR in nine-month period - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Cambodian gaming operator NagaCorp announced that for the nine months ending September 30th, 2024, the group achieved gross gaming revenue of $411 million, an increase of 8.4 percent year-on-year.

data.title: Cambodian Microfinance Loans Based on Rising Land Prices Point to Further NPL Increase - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: According to forthcoming research, the rate of non-performing loans at the country’s microfinance lenders is higher than publicly disclosed.

data.title: ​LOLC Cambodia Strengthening Financial Literacy Awareness Efforts ​
data.description: ​​LOLC Cambodia Strengthening Financial Literacy Awareness Efforts ​

data.title: Cambodian fishers-turned-citizen scientists monitor marine mammal deaths - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: In Cambodia, the NGO Khmer Ocean Life has trained residents of coastal fishing communities about threats to marine mammals so they can participate in a citizen scientist network aimed at tracking bycatch and strandings.

data.title: ​It’s high time to turn the ‘Right to Foods’ for a healthy, nutritious and affordable diet into reality​
data.description: ​​It’s high time to turn the ‘Right to Foods’ for a healthy, nutritious and affordable diet into reality​

data.title: Hope For Mekong Dolphins As Cambodia Numbers Increase: Minister - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: The number of Mekong dolphins has risen to more than 100 in Cambodia, the agriculture minister said Monday, raising a glimmer of hope for the endangered mammals.

data.title: ‘More than a tent, less than a palace’: The house that Andy Goh built - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: He has been involved in some of the region’s grandest projects, but this hospitality group founder and CEO is trading it all for a simpler – but no less luxurious – life.
